node.title: Monkey copping a wire where it hurts wins Comedy Wildlife Photography Award
node.alt: A monkey looks shocked as it sits abreast a wire.
node.description: The Comedy Wildlife Photography Awards dub a monkey's painful pose on a taut wire the funniest animal photo of the year.
node.content:
["A monkey cops a taut wire right where it hurts, a look of pained surprise on his face \u2014 it's the height of comedy.", "Or at least that's what the judges of the Comedy Wildlife Photography Awards believe,\u00a0bestowing their top 2021 prize to photographer Ken Jensen for his aptly named photo,\u00a0\"Ouch!\".", "The image actually shows a golden silk monkey in Yunnan, China\u00a0during a display of aggression.", "But his eye-bulging expression \u2014 immediately relatable to any man who's been hit below the belt\u00a0\u2014 won Jensen the top prize.", "Jensen's prize is a safari tour, where the potential for more animals in hilarious predicaments awaits.\u00a0", "Check out the full list of winners below.", "
Creatures in the air award
", "", "
This pigeon is done with life.(Comedy Wildlife Photography Awards 2021/John Speirs)
", "
Creatures on land award
", "", "
This \"Ninja Prairie Dog\" dodged an eagle and bamboozled his predator.(Comedy Wildlife Photography Awards 2021/Arthur Trevino)
", "
Creatures under the sea award
", "", "
When mum says it's time for school but you're still playing.(Comedy Wildlife Photography Awards 2021)
", "
Internet portfolio award
", "", "
The butt dunk, the\u00a0face plant, the shake-off\u00a0and the final scratch.(Comedy Wildlife Photography Awards 2021/Vicki Jauron)
", "
Highly commended
", "", "
Talk about a bad day.(Comedy Wildlife Photography Awards 2021/David Eppley)
", "", "
Proboscis monkey cuddling a tree, K-I-S-S-I-N-G.(Comedy Wildlife Photography Awards 2021/Jakub Hodan)
", "", "
Hide and seek.(Comedy Wildlife Photography Awards 2021/Paul Marchhart)
", "", "
\"Do a flip this time.\"(Comedy Wildlife Photography Awards 2021/Roland Kranitz)
", "", "
\"Let's dance.\"(Comedy Wildlife Photography Awards 2021/Andy Parkinson)
", "", "
This kangaroo could improve his aim somewhat...(Comedy Wildlife Photography Awards 2021/ Lea Scaddan)
", "", "
Who can jump higher?(Comedy Wildlife Photography Awards 2021/Chu Han Lin)
", "", "
Someone's been watching too many Spiderman movies...(Comedy Wildlife Photography Awards 2021/Nicolas De Vaulx)
", "", "
\"Hmph\".(Comedy Wildlife Photography Awards 2021/Gurumoorthy Gurumoorthy)
", "", "
\"Psst, wanna hear a secret?\"(Comedy Wildlife Photography Awards 2021/Jan Piecha)
"]
